description: The Trovat T-Shirt Men is made from pleasantly soft, quick-drying drirelease® material. An antimicrobial treatment avoids unpleasant odors and makes sure you feel good even on strenuous sections of your hikes. The shirt comes in different print options for an individual look. From relaxed hikes to mountain tours – it's perfect.
name: Mammut Trovat T-Shirt - Mens
